summary: This is a USMS Prisoner Schedule Report for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated July 31, 2019. It lists Jeffrey Epstein as a prisoner scheduled for a court appearance, noting his status, special cautions (including mental concerns and suicidal tendencies), and the presiding judge.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

events.title: Epstein Scheduled Court Appearance

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was in custody at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York on July 31, 2019.
The document notes special cautions for Epstein including 'Mental Concerns' and 'Suicidal Tendencies'.
Epstein was scheduled for a court appearance, with Judge Berman.G listed as the presiding judge.
The offense listed is '3699 Sex Offense'.
The document is a USMS Prisoner Schedule Report, marked 'Limited Official Use'.
